name: 10-sql
description: ## MySQL By default, mysql is started, to stop it, use ```systemctl stop mysql```, for start, restart, or status, replace `stop` with that in command </br> Easy way to see mysql in graphical way is to open mysql workbench </br> To connect mysql in terminal (with root user), use command ```mysql -u root -p``` </br>
author: Shubham
